::DevilDuer/Perndabot::

On his own comm-link, DevilDuer picked up Zardus' orders. He shakes his head, 
dropping the pile of metal he has been carrying in the cargo hold and turning 
around.

"If anyone asks, I've been mortally wounded and can't go with Scattershot," 
he says to Perndabot, turning to walk out of the room.

A big hand on the back of his neck stops him in midstride.

"If you don't follow Zardus' orders," Perndabot says, "I will make you 
mortally wounded."

DevilDuer mutters several choice curses. "Oh fine!" He says and walks off, 
muttering to himself.

"I'm on my way, Scattershot," he says into his comm-link.
